examples.text: This fine ruin was, in former times, a royal castle.
This beautiful old building has been restored to **its former glory**.
her former life as a Russian ballerina

definitions.definition: that used to have a particular position or status in the past

examples.text: former South African president Nelson Mandela
the countries of the former Soviet Union

definitions.definition: used to refer to the first of two things or people mentioned

examples.text: The former option would be much more sensible.

definitions.definition: to not have the strength, influence, etc. that you used to have

examples.text: When his career ended, he became a shadow of his former self.

wordOrigin: Middle English: from Old English forma ‘first’ + -er.
